attributes.action: Introduce legislation that encourages those immigrants with unpronounceable surnames
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Especially doctors, to adopt a wholly British or at least a hyphenated British surname, which would facilitate one addressing them in a non offensive manner.

rejection.details: Title of the petition contradicts the detail.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
